      • createAlert

        public static void createAlert(java.lang.String content)
        Creates an alert with the header "Error" that will pop up and alert the user.
        Parameters:

      • createChoiceDialog

        public static boolean createChoiceDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                         java.lang.String header,
                                         java.lang.String content)
        Creates a choice dialog that will pop up and ask the user to confirm an action. It will present the user with two buttons, Cancel and OK.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the popup
        header - the test for the header, null for no header
        content - the contents of the popup
        Returns:
        True if the user clicks ok, false otherwise

      • createAddListDialog

        public static java.lang.String createAddListDialog()
        Creates a pop up that asks the user for to enter a name for a new list.
        Returns:
        The name if any text is entered and ok clicked, otherwise null.

      • createExceptionDialog

        public static void createExceptionDialog(java.lang.Exception e)
        Creates a popup informing the user of an error and to contact "us". Displays a stacktrace of the exception.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that occurred

      • createExceptionDialog

        public static void createExceptionDialog(java.lang.Exception exception,
                                         java.lang.String header,
                                         java.lang.String content)
        Creates a popup informing the user of an error. Displays a stacktrace of the exception.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception that occurred
        header - The header of the popup
        content - The content of the popup
